name: Rogue Crush
description:
Instructions

Use Left Mouse Click To Play.
Blue tiles on the left board shows your available actions.
Purple tiles on the left board shows the enemy attack zone.
Every action costs some resource. Match three to get more resources.
Numbers on the bottom right corner shows how many resources you currently have.
Match three of the same coloured orbs inside the bag to gerenrate more moves. (Select two adjacent orbs. You can swap two orbs even if there is no match.)
Esc to return to this menu.
* Steps + Empty Tile = Move Player 
 * Dagger + Adjacent Enemy = Kill enemy 
 * Arrow + Aligned Enemy = Kill enemy 
 * Key + Chest = Bonus Loot
